answers.answer: I read boiling ginger in water and drinking it as a tea helps with headaches. Never tried it but it's natural. Just haven't had time to go to the grocery store.
Oh thank you! I will def try right now.
Do u have any swelling going on? It could be ur blood pressure u should check it
My eyes are swollen and irritated.

You need to go see your dr or go to urgent care bc can be high blood pressure..  Have you tried lying down on left side with your legs up. Drink lots of water,  but vicks on your temples and cold cloth over your eyes and sleep abit. But better you get checked out if not gone in few hrs
If its allergies, u can take zyrtec or benadryl.
I will try that ladies and if I see no improvement definitely going to the hospital. Thank you
Hope you feel better...I agree if there is swelling its better to get checked out. For the headache try ice cream. Also an icepack on your neck and cold towel on your head in a dark room.

Check blood pressure!I get migraines bad ! My OB has me on medicTion for mine and it doesn't always help. It may be a number of things cAusing it. Ur nasal passages try a humidifier. I take hot bathes. Or a ice pack on my head. Also my bf gives me massages. Try a lil caffeine sometimes that's it too. But talk to ur doctor about them. Could be something serious also. Hypertension or preeclampsia

I'm thinking it most def is high blood pressure bc nothing I do helps. Calling my Dr today and possibly going to l&d to get checked. Already arranged for my kids to stay at my moms for the day. Let's see what happens.  Wish me luck ladies. Now Should I take my hospital bags?

question: What can I drink? I've been taking Tylenol every 4-6 hours and it barely does anything. I read somewhere coffe or caffeine will do the trick but coffee makes me beyond stomach sick and I don't want to drink soda bc I'm a struggling recovered addict and one taste of soda will make me fall back. Any suggestions please!!??
title: massive headaches help please :(
